TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner Display on Mobile Browser - Android
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner is displayed correctly when accessing the PSC application from an Android mobile browser.
Test Steps: 1. Open a supported Android mobile browser.
2. Navigate to the PSC application login screen.
Expected Result: 1. Smart Banner: Displayed at the top or bottom of the screen.
2. App Name: Displayed correctly.
3. App Information: 'Download PaySchools Central Mobile App for easy mobile payments, manage student accounts, lunch balances, fees, and more—all at your fingertips!'
4. App Screenshots: Displayed correctly as per design.
5. Install Button: Visible and correctly labeled.
6. Close Button: Visible and correctly displayed.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner Display on Mobile Browser - iOS
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner is displayed correctly when accessing the PSC application from an iOS mobile browser.
Test Steps: 1. Open a supported iOS mobile browser (Safari).
2. Navigate to the PSC application login screen.
Expected Result: 1. Smart Banner: Displayed at the top or bottom of the screen.

3. App Information: 'Download PaySchools Central Mobile App for easy mobile payments, manage student accounts, lunch balances, fees, and more—all at your fingertips!'

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner Not Displayed on Desktop Browser
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner is not displayed when accessing the PSC application from a desktop web browser.
Test Steps: 1. Open any supported desktop web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, etc.).
2. Navigate to the PSC application login screen.
Expected Result: 1. Smart Banner: Not displayed.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner Not Displayed in PSM Mobile App
Description: This test case verifies that the smart banner is not displayed within the PSM mobile application.
Test Steps: 1. Open the PSM mobile application on an Android or iOS device.
2. Log in to the application if required.
Expected Result: 1. Smart Banner: Not displayed on any screen within the PSM app.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Install Button Functionality - Android
Description: This test case verifies that clicking the 'Install' button on the smart banner redirects the user to the Google Play Store on an Android device.
Test Steps: 1. Access the PSC application login screen on an Android mobile browser.
2. Tap on the 'Install' button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Redirection: The user should be redirected to the Google Play Store.
2. Correct App: The Play Store should display the listing for the PSM mobile application.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - GET Button Functionality - iOS
Description: This test case verifies that clicking the 'GET' button on the smart banner redirects the user to the Apple App Store on an iOS device.
Test Steps: 1. Access the PSC application login screen on an iOS mobile browser (Safari).
2. Tap on the 'GET' button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Redirection: The user should be redirected to the Apple App Store.
2. Correct App: The App Store should display the listing for the PSM mobile application.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Open Button Functionality
Description: This test case verifies that the 'Open' button is displayed when the PSM app is installed and redirects the user to the PSM application.
Test Steps: 1. Install the PSM mobile application on the device (if not already installed).
2. Access the PSC application login screen on the mobile browser.
Expected Result: 1. Open Button: The smart banner should display an 'Open' button instead of 'Install' or 'GET'.
2. Redirection: Tapping the 'Open' button should launch the PSM mobile application.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Close Button Functionality
Description: This test case verifies that the close button dismisses the smart banner.
Test Steps: 1. Access the PSC application login screen on a mobile browser.
2. Tap on the close (x) button in the smart banner.
Expected Result: 1. Banner Dismissal: The smart banner should be closed and no longer visible on the screen.

TC_Summary: Verify Smart Banner - Expanded and Collapsed Views
Description: This test case verifies the expanded and collapsed views of the smart banner and the transition between them.
Test Steps: 1. Access the PSC application login screen on a mobile browser.
2. Verify the banner is in its expanded view by default (showing app name, information, screenshots, and buttons).
3. Tap on the collapse icon.
4. Verify the banner collapses to show only the app name and buttons.
5. Tap on the expand icon (or the collapsed banner area).
6. Verify the banner expands to show the full content again.
Expected Result: 1. Default View: The banner should be in its expanded view upon loading.
2. Collapsed View: Tapping the collapse icon should transition the banner to its collapsed view, hiding the app information and screenshots.
3. Expanded View: Tapping the expand icon or the collapsed banner area should return it to the expanded view.
